クラス DamageObject

java.lang.Object
xyz.mlserver.advancementcreator.shared.SharedObject
xyz.mlserver.advancementcreator.shared.DamageObject
public class DamageObject extends SharedObject
Specifies information about a damage event.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • getDealt

      @Nullable public @Nullable RangeObject getDealt()
      戻り値:
      the dealt damage (damage reduction modifiers (eg. armor) are not yet applied) or null, if none was specified

    • getTaken

      @Nullable public @Nullable RangeObject getTaken()
      戻り値:
      the taken damage (damage reduction modifiers (eg. armor) are applied) or null, if none was specified

    • isBlocked

      @Nullable public @Nullable Boolean isBlocked()
      戻り値:
      whether the damage is blocked or null, if this wasn't specified

    • getType

      @Nullable public @Nullable DamageFlagsObject getType()
      戻り値:
      more information about the damage event or null, if none was specified

    • getSourceEntity

      @Nullable public @Nullable EntityObject getSourceEntity()
      戻り値:
      information about the dealer of the damage or null, if none was specified

    • setDealt

      public DamageObject setDealt(@Nullable @Nullable RangeObject dealt)
      パラメータ:
      dealt - the dealt damage (damage reduction modifiers (eg. armor) are not yet applied) or null, if it should be cleared
      戻り値:
      the current damage object for chaining

    • setTaken

      public DamageObject setTaken(@Nullable @Nullable RangeObject taken)
      パラメータ:
      taken - the taken damage (damage reduction modifiers (eg. armor) are applied) or null, if it should be cleared
      戻り値:
      the current damage object for chaining

    • setBlocked

      public DamageObject setBlocked(@Nullable @Nullable Boolean blocked)
      パラメータ:
      blocked - whether the damage is blocked or null, if it should be cleared
      戻り値:
      the current damage object for chaining

      public DamageObject setType(@Nullable @Nullable DamageFlagsObject type)
      パラメータ:

      戻り値:
